comment: Andrew Thomas: OCTA offers a great trading experience with low spreads and fast execution. Very satisfied!
Mia Miller: Customer service at OCTA has been disappointing. Long wait times and unhelpful responses.
Christopher Rodriguez: OCTA has consistently provided a top-notch trading experience. Fast executions and great customer service.
Andrew Thomas: I've experienced too many technical issues with OCTA and am looking for alternatives.
